Message:
I want to cover
the world in flowers.

If pretty flowers bloom
everywhere, then everyone
will get along, right?

Witch or not, everyone will
all get to be happy, right?

That’s why...I’m going to
fill the world with flowers.

In my dream, someone calls
out to me.

“Natasha, it’s time to get up.”
Dad, is that you?

“You need to wake up
on your own now, okay?”

Don’t go.
I can’t do anything
without you two.

The two of them begin to
slowly disappear.

Wait! Don’t leave me
all alone here!

I opened my eyes abruptly
to see someone extending
his hand out to me.
